job_tasks.phrase: loves to code and build working systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of building functional software systems, aligning with traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of software creation, which is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: creating a virtual director that will automatically generate the best video and best avatar performance based on the context of a user script.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the core process of developing and training a model (virtual director) to generate specific outputs (video/avatar performance), which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: extracting cues from a large pool of proprietary video and audio data
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the process of obtaining and preparing data (video and audio) for use in model training, which is a key data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: train LLMs for text or multi-modal tasks that will help us create human-like avatars and effective powerful videos.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions training LLMs for specific generative tasks (text/multi-modal, avatars, videos), fitting the definition of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on writing code that is suitable for production environments, a core responsibility in software development.
This involves managing and being responsible for the operational aspects of pipelines, which aligns with MLOps/LLMOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in finding and collecting appropriate data for the tasks.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the initial stages of data handling, including sourcing and gathering data, which is part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Make sure we have correct pipelines in place to ingest data from existing processed data, text, voice and video and adjust granularity.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves setting up and managing data ingestion pipelines, a key responsibility in data engineering for preparing data for models.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyse and pre-process data if necessary.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the crucial steps of data analysis and transformation before it can be used for model training, falling under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Help define and run experimentation to facilitate predicting emotion signals from different architecture choices of the adapted LLM.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves experimentation with model architectures and predicting signals, which is central to model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Take hypotheses, ideas or papers and create implementations of solutions on the back of these
job_tasks.justification: This describes translating research concepts (hypotheses, papers) into practical implementations, a core part of model development and research engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Run experiments on the back of the created implementations that evaluate and verify hypotheses
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the experimental validation of models and hypotheses, a key activity in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering practices aimed at ensuring code quality, maintainability, and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: Help a team of research engineers, scientists and linguists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices
job_tasks.justification: This task involves contributing to code quality and best practices within a team, which is a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work 'full stack' with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of production-ready software and a full-stack approach, aligning with core software engineering principles.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a drive for innovation and engagement with novel, advanced challenges.

soft_skills.phrase: used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
soft_skills.justification: Working in a fast-paced environment requires adaptability and a willingness to learn quickly.

soft_skills.phrase: opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams, highlighting the importance of teamwork and communication.
Taking ownership signifies a proactive approach and responsibility for the outcome of one's work.

soft_skills.phrase: Help a team of research engineers, scientists and linguists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices
soft_skills.justification: This phrase emphasizes assisting and working with a diverse team, indicating strong collaboration and communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a role that requires a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (building systems, production code, pipelines, testing, code reviews) and specialized GenAI tasks (training LLMs for multi-modal tasks, creating virtual directors, experimentation with adapted LLMs). The focus is clearly on Generative AI, specifically LLMs and text-to-video generation, making 'Core GenAI Engineer' the most appropriate profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is highly detailed, clearly outlining responsibilities related to both software development and AI/LLM model development. The language used is specific and directly maps to the categories in the coding book, leaving little room for ambiguity.
